job_tasks.phrase: use generative AI and foundation models to reimagine the experience of all builders on AWS
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions the use of generative AI and foundation models, which are core components of modern modeling tasks, especially in the GenAI domain.

job_tasks.phrase: From the IDE to web based tools and services AI will help engineers to work on large and small applications.
job_tasks.justification: This indicates the application of AI, likely involving models, to enhance developer productivity and functionality within applications.

job_tasks.phrase: The Amazon Web Services (AWS) IDE team provides developers with different tools and services that make it easy to develop modern cloud applications.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the core function of providing tools and services for developing cloud applications, which falls under software development.

job_tasks.phrase: We provide the IDE Toolkits for Eclipse, IntelliJ, Visual Studio, and Visual Studio Code.
job_tasks.justification: Mentioning specific IDEs and toolkits implies the development and maintenance of software integrations and extensions.

job_tasks.phrase: With AWS Cloud9, we also provide our customers with a Web-based IDE.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the development of a web-based IDE, a clear software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: Develop cloud-based solutions that will delight software developers and system administrators globally
job_tasks.justification: This is a direct statement about developing solutions, which is a software development responsibility.

job_tasks.phrase: Create innovative products and see them launched in high volume production environments
job_tasks.justification: Creating products and launching them into production environments is a fundamental software development and deployment activity.
On-call rotation typically involves supporting and maintaining systems in production, which aligns with operations engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: This position involves On-call responsibility. We work as a team to root-cause the issues and ensure our systems are resilient and fault-tolerant.
job_tasks.justification: This further clarifies the on-call responsibility as being related to system resilience, fault tolerance, and issue resolution, which are operations engineering concerns.

job_tasks.phrase: The Amazon Web Services (AWS) IDE team provides developers with different tools and services that make it easy to develop modern cloud applications.
job_tasks.justification: This sentence describes the team's purpose and the value proposition of their offerings to developers, indicating an understanding of the user's needs and business context.

job_tasks.phrase: We work on the Amazon Web Services (AWS) Next Gen DevX (NGDE) team where we are going to use generative AI and foundation models to reimagine the experience of all builders on AWS.
job_tasks.justification: This outlines the strategic direction of the team to reimagine developer experience using AI, demonstrating business alignment and understanding of a future state.

soft_skills.phrase: Learn and use modern and advanced technologies
Collaborate with internal engineering teams, leading technology companies around the world and the open source community
We work as a team to root-cause the issues and ensure our systems are resilient and fault-tolerant.
impact the life of engineers around the world.

classification.rationale: The job description explicitly mentions the use of 'generative AI and foundation models' to reimagine developer experience. It emphasizes building tools and services for developers, integrating AI into IDEs and web-based tools, which aligns directly with the core definition of a GenAI Engineer focused on language, vision, and interaction specialist.
